abilities.desc: While active, Troll Warlord swaps from using ranged to melee attacks. Melee attacks have a chance to ensnare, preventing the target from moving or using mobility spells. Berserker\'s Rage also grants additional movement speed, armor, and decreases base attack time.Whirling Axes has different functionality while Berserker\'s Rage is active.
abilities.name: Berserker's Rage
abilities.notes: Cooldowns of items that are different for ranged and melee units will be based on which form Troll Warlord was in when the item was used.

abilities.desc: Troll hurls a fistful of five axes in a cone shape over 950.0 range, slowing and damaging enemy units.
abilities.name: Whirling Axes (Ranged)

abilities.desc: Troll hurls two axes around him in a close range area of effect, damaging enemy units and causing them to miss some attacks.
abilities.name: Whirling Axes (Melee)

abilities.desc: With each continuous blow on the same target, Troll gains increased attack speed.  If Troll changes targets, the stacks drop to zero.
abilities.name: Fervor

abilities.desc: Grants all allied Heroes globally a bonus based on whichever stance Troll Warlord is currently in. Ranged provides bonus Attack Speed and melee provides Status Resistance.
abilities.name: Rampage

abilities.desc: Troll unleashes a powerful battle trance, that forces you to continuously attack the closest enemy unit within 900 range, prioritizing heroes. Damage does not kill you during this mode. Grants you bonus lifesteal, attack speed and movement speed. Applies a Basic Dispel.DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
abilities.name: Battle Trance
abilities.notes: Troll is granted vision over the target.
